Object.Field: Copy (3) of IKM SQL to EPM Cloud Service-PBCS(DATA)
The name of the job of type IMPORT_DATA defined in the PBCS UI. This job should have Source Type as Essbase & have the same Cube name as that of the Plan type of the target datastore.
Flag to indicate if logging should be performed during the load process. If set to Yes, logging would be done to the file specified by the LOG_FILE_NAME option.
The fully qualified name of the file into which logging is to be done.Do not use backslashes (\) in the filename.

Boolean Flag to indicate whether to run a CLEAR_CUBE job on the Cloud before data is loaded. This requires a job of type CLEAR_CUBE to be setup onetime in the PBCS UI. The name of the CLEAR_CUBE job has to be referenced in the CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME option.
Name of the CLEAR_CUBE job defined in the PBCS UI.
Flag for running Business Rule before data load.
Determines whether to run a business rule before data load. Useful if you want to selectively clear an intersection of the cube, by passing run time parameters.
Name of the pre-load business rule as defined/deployed from the Calc Manager.
Run time parameters for pre-load business rule. Format: var1:value1 In case of multiple params, separate each param by comma delimiters. eg: var1:value1,var2:value2
Flag for running Business Rule after data load.
Determines whether to run a business rule after data load. Useful if you want to aggregate or copy data by passing run time parameters.
Name of the post-load business rule as defined/deployed from the Calc Manager.
Run time parameters for post-load business rule. Format: var1:value1 In case of multiple params, separate each param by comma delimiters. eg: var1:value1,var2:value2

COMPONENT NAME: IKM SQL to EPM Cloud Service-PBCS(DATA)
AUTHOR: Thejas B Shetty, Oracle SSI Version: 1.0 Date: 04-May-2018
Description : - Integration Knowledge Module For Planning & Budgeting Cloud Service(PBCS). - Loads data from a generic SQL technology to PBCS,EPBCS Applications. - Use RKM EPM Cloud Service-PBCS to reverse engineer the application plantype datastores.

#Function to load data into PBCS Application using REST API. def loadHPLData(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,ImportJobName,FileName): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'applications/' + HPLAppName + '/jobs' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) RequestPayload = JSONObject() RequestPayload.put("jobType","IMPORT_DATA") RequestPayload.put("jobName",ImportJobName) Parameters = JSONObject() Parameters.put("importFileName",FileName) RequestPayload.put("parameters",Parameters) LoadResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"POST",ServiceHeader,str(RequestPayload)) LoadJobID = LoadResponse.get("jobId") LoadDetails = LoadResponse.get("details") if LoadResponse.get("status") <= 0: return LoadJobID else: raise "HPLLoadData",LoadDetails
#Function to retrieve Job Details from PBCS Job Library def getHPLJobDetails(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,JobID): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + "applications/%s/jobs/%s/details" % (HPLAppName,JobID) ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) HPLJobResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"GET",ServiceHeader,None) try: return HPLJobResponse.get("items").get(0).get("items") except: raise "JobDetailsError","Error Occured in Fetching Job Details from Job Library"
#Function to delete a file on EPM Cloud(PBCS) using Migration REST API. def deleteHPLFile(MigBaseURL,Username,Password,FileName): ServiceURL = MigBaseURL + 'applicationsnapshots/' + FileName ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) HPLDelete = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"DELETE",ServiceHeader,None) return HPLDelete
try: try: #Load data into PBCS Plan Type LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Loading data to %s:%s on Cloud.
"%(HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)) ImportJobName = "<%=odiRef.getOption("DATA_LOAD_JOB_NAME")%>" LoadStatus = "" try: LoadJobID = loadHPLData(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,ImportJobName,DataFileName) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Triggered Data Load on Cloud with Job ID : %s.
" % (LoadJobID)) except: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8") + "
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8")) LoadStatusArray = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,LoadJobID) LoadStatus = LoadStatusArray[0] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Waiting for Data Load with Job ID : %s to complete.
" % (LoadJobID)) while LoadStatus in ["IN PROGRESS"]: time.sleep(3) LoadStatusArray = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,LoadJobID) LoadStatus = LoadStatusArray[0] LoadJobDetails = getHPLJobDetails(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,LoadJobID) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') for i in range(0,LoadJobDetails.length()): LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + LoadJobDetails.get(i).get("msgType") + " - " + LoadJobDetails.get(i).get("msgText").strip() + "
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Data Load with Job ID : %s finished with status: %s.
" % (LoadJobID,LoadStatus)) if LoadStatus == "ERROR": LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') raise "DataLoadError","Data Load with Job ID : %s failed." % (LoadJobID) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') finally: #Destroy Data File on Cloud. LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Destroying data file on Cloud.
") deleteFile = deleteHPLFile(MigBaseURL,Username,Password,DataFileName) if deleteFile.get("status") <> 0: raise "DeleteFileError",deleteFile.get("details") else: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Data file destroyed on Cloud successfully.
") if LoadStatus == "COMPLETED": LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') except: LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8"))

try: #Run business rule after data load. This executes a job of type RULES on PBCS server. POST_LOAD_RUN_RULE = bool(<%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RUN_RULE")%>) POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME = "<%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME")%>" POST_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS = "<%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS")%>".split(",") if POST_LOAD_RUN_RULE == True: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Running Calculation Rule after data load with rule name: %s.
"%(POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME)) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') try: PostRuleParams = JSONObject() for r in POST_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS: p = r.split(":") PostRuleParams.put(p[0],p[1]) PostRuleJobResponse = HPLRunRule(HPLBaseURL,HPLAppName,Username,Password,POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME,PostRuleParams) PostRuleJobID = PostRuleJobResponse[0] PostRuleJobDetails = PostRuleJobResponse[1] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Rule Parameters - %s
" % (str(PostRuleParams))) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Calculation Rule job for %s-%s initiated with Job ID - %s.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType,PostRuleJobID)) except: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Initiation of Calculation Rule job for %s-%s failed.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8") + "
") raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8")) PostRuleStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,PostRuleJobID)[0] while PostRuleStatus in ["IN PROGRESS"]: time.sleep(3) PostRuleStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,PostRuleJobID)[0] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Calculation Rule job with Job ID : %s finished with status - %s.
" % (PostRuleJobID,PostRuleStatus)) if PostRuleStatus == "ERROR": raise "JobFailure","Calculation Rule job with Job ID : %s failed." % (PostRuleJobID) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Finished running Calculation Rule after data load.
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) except: LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8"))

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

import sys,os import math,time,datetime import org.json.JSONObject as JSONObject import xml.etree.ElementTree as ElementTree
#PBCS Connection Details. Username = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>" Password = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>" EPMApplicationType = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_CATALOG")%>" HPLBaseURL = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/HyperionPlanning/rest/v3/" HPLAppName = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_SCHEMA")%>" HPLPlanType = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("TARG_NAME")%>".split("_")[1] sourceConnection = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
if EPMApplicationType <> "PBCS": raise "IKM Error","This IKM is supported only for PBCS/EPBCS type of EPM Cloud applications. Please use 'PBCS' as Application Type in the Physical Schema."
#Generic Function to invoke a RESTful webservice using Basic authentication & return the JSON response. global invokeRESTService def invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Userame,Password,Method,HeaderArray,Payload): import urllib,urllib2,base64 base64Password = base64.encodestring("%s:%s"%(Userame,Password))[:-1] RESTRequest = urllib2.Request(ServiceURL) RESTRequest.add_header("Authorization","Basic %s" % base64Password) for header in HeaderArray: RESTRequest.add_header(header[0],header[1]) RESTRequest.get_method = lambda: Method try: httpRequest = urllib2.urlopen(RESTRequest,Payload) jsonResponse = httpRequest.read() httpRequest.close() return JSONObject(jsonResponse) except urllib2.HTTPError,e: if e.code in [201,400]: return JSONObject(e.read()) else: raise "RESTAPIInvokeError",str(e.code) + " - " + e.read()
#Generic Function to invoke a RESTful webservice using Basic authentication & return the XML response. global invokeRESTServiceXML def invokeRESTServiceXML(ServiceURL,Userame,Password,Method,HeaderArray,Payload): import urllib,urllib2,base64 base64Password = base64.encodestring("%s:%s"%(Userame,Password))[:-1] RESTRequest = urllib2.Request(ServiceURL) RESTRequest.add_header("Authorization","Basic %s" % base64Password) for header in HeaderArray: RESTRequest.add_header(header[0],header[1]) RESTRequest.get_method = lambda: Method try: httpRequest = urllib2.urlopen(RESTRequest,Payload) xmlResponse = httpRequest.read() httpRequest.close() return ElementTree.fromstring(xmlResponse) except urllib2.HTTPError,e: if e.code in [201,400]: return ElementTree.fromstring(e.read()) else: raise "RESTAPIXMLInvokeError",str(e.code) + " - " + e.read()
#Function to Retrieve List of PBCS Applications def getHPLApplications(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'applications' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) appsResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"GET",ServiceHeader,None) appList = [] try: appArray = appsResponse.get("items") for i in range(0,appArray.length()): if appArray.get(i).get("type") == "HP": appList.append(str(appArray.get(i).get("name"))) return appList except: raise "getHPLApplications",str(appsResponse)
#Function to Retrieve List of PlanTypes for a PBCS application. def getHPLPlanTypes(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'internal/applications/' + HPLAppName + '/legacymetadata' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","text/xml"]) xmlRoot = invokeRESTServiceXML(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"GET",ServiceHeader,None) xmlplanTypes = xmlRoot.find("plantypes") HPLPlanTypes = [] for p in xmlplanTypes: HPLPlanTypes.append(p.get("name")) return HPLPlanTypes
#Function to Retrieve List of Dimensions for a given PlanType of PBCS application. def getHPLDimensions(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,PlanType): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'internal/applications/' + HPLAppName + '/legacymetadata' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","text/xml"]) xmlRoot = invokeRESTServiceXML(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"GET",ServiceHeader,None) xmlplanTypes = xmlRoot.find("plantypes") hplDimensions = [] for p in xmlplanTypes: if p.get("name") == PlanType: xmlDimensions = p.find("dimensions").findall("dimension") for d in xmlDimensions: if d.get("type") <> "Attribute": hplDimensions.append(d.get("name")) return hplDimensions
#Initialise Log Writer try: LogEnabled = bool(<%=odiRef.getOption("LOG_ENABLED")%>) if LogEnabled == True: LFile = open("<%=odiRef.getOption("LOG_FILENAME")%>","w") else: LFile = open(HPLAppName + "_<%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>.log","w") except: raise "LogFile Error","There was an error attempting to open the LogFile defined in IKM option. Enter a valid LogFile name."
try: #Print ODI Session Details & IKM Option Values LFile.write('IKM SQL to EPM Cloud Service-PBCS(DATA)
') LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write('ODI Session Number: <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>
') LFile.write('Username: <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>
') LFile.write('PBCS Base URL: <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/HyperionPlanning/rest/v3/
') LFile.write('Migration Base URL: <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/interop/rest/11.1.2.3.600/
') LFile.write('Application Name: <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_SCHEMA")%>
') LFile.write('Plan Type Name: %s
' %(HPLPlanType)) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write('PRE_LOAD_CLEAR_CUBE: <%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_CLEAR_CUBE")%>
') LFile.write('CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME: <%=odiRef.getOption("CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME")%>
') LFile.write('PRE_LOAD_RUN_RULE: <%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RUN_RULE")%>
') LFile.write('PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME: <%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME")%>
') LFile.write('PRE_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS: <%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS")%>
') LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write('POST_LOAD_RUN_RULE: <%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RUN_RULE")%>
') LFile.write('POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME: <%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RULE_NAME")%>
') LFile.write('POST_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS: <%=odiRef.getOption("POST_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS")%>
') LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
')
#Fetch List of Apps from PBCS & validate application name. LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Fetching List of Applications from EPM Cloud.
") HPLApps = getHPLApplications(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password) if HPLAppName not in HPLApps: LFile.write(HPLAppName + " application is not found in EPM Cloud Service. Enter valid application name.
") raise "AppNotFound",HPLAppName + " application is not found in EPM Cloud Service. Enter valid application name." else: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + HPLAppName + " is a valid PBCS/EPBCS application.
")
#Fetch List of Dimensions from PBCS application for the target Plan Type LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Fetching List of Dimensions from %s application - %s cube.
"%(HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)) HPLDims = getHPLDimensions(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)
#Fetch Source Recordset LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Fetching Source Data Recordset.
") Statement = sourceConnection.createStatement() srcQuery= """select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS") %> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION] [ALIAS_SEP] "[COL_NAME]"", ",", "", "INS and !TRG") %> from <%=odiRef.getFrom() %> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getFilter() %> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter() %> <%=odiRef.getJoin() %> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy() %> <%=odiRef.getHaving() %>""" Recordset = Statement.executeQuery(srcQuery)
#Write contents of source recordset into datafile LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Writing the records into local datafile.
") recordCount = 0 DataFileName = "%s_%s_<%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>.txt"%(HPLAppName,HPLPlanType) DFile = open(DataFileName, "w") while Recordset.next(): recordCount = recordCount + 1 for i in range(0,len(HPLDims)): if Recordset.getString(str(HPLDims[i].strip())) is None: DFile.write('""' + "	") elif Recordset.getString(str(HPLDims[i].strip())) == 'IGNORE': continue else: DFile.write('"' + Recordset.getString(str(HPLDims[i].strip())) + '"' + "	") DFile.write(Recordset.getString("DataAmount") + "
") LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : %s records written into file.
" % (str(recordCount))) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Closing Recordset Object.
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
')
#Close Objects DFile.close() Recordset.close() Statement.close() sourceConnection.close() except: if 'DFile' in locals(): if DFile.closed == False: DFile.close() LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) if 'Recordset' in locals(): Recordset.close() Statement.close() sourceConnection.close() if 'DataFileName' in locals(): if os.path.exists(DataFileName): os.remove(DataFileName) raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8"))

#Function to upload a file into EPM Cloud Service using Migration REST API. def uploadEPMFile(MigBaseURL,Username,Password,FileName,fContent,isFirst,isLast,chunkSize,extDirPath): if extDirPath == "": ServiceURL = MigBaseURL + 'applicationsnapshots/' + FileName + '/contents?q={"isLast":%s,"isFirst":%s,"chunkSize":%d}' % (isFirst,isLast,chunkSize) else: ServiceURL = MigBaseURL + 'applicationsnapshots/' + FileName + '/contents?q={"isLast":%s,"isFirst":%s,"chunkSize":%d,"extDirPath":"%s"}' % (isFirst,isLast,chunkSize,extDirPath) ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/octet-stream"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) uploadStatus = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"POST",ServiceHeader,fContent).get("status") return uploadStatus
try: #Upload Data File to Cloud using Migration REST API & destroy Local file MigBaseURL = "<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/interop/rest/11.1.2.3.600/" LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Uploading local data file to Cloud.
") DefaultChunkSize = 2 * 1024 * 1024 DataFileSize = os.stat(DataFileName).st_size LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Total Size of Data File - %s bytes.
" % (str(DataFileSize))) totalBytesRead = 0 currPacketNumber = 0 lastPacketNumber = math.ceil(float(DataFileSize)/DefaultChunkSize) try: f = open(DataFileName, "rb") while(totalBytesRead < DataFileSize): nextChunkSize = min(DefaultChunkSize,DataFileSize - totalBytesRead) currPacketNumber = currPacketNumber + 1 currBytes = f.read(nextChunkSize) totalBytesRead = totalBytesRead + nextChunkSize if currPacketNumber == 1: isFirst = "true" else: isFirst = "false" if currPacketNumber == lastPacketNumber: isLast = "true" else: isLast = "false" LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Uploading Packet Number - %d, Packet Size - %d bytes, isFirst - %s, isLast - %s 
" % (currPacketNumber,nextChunkSize,isFirst,isLast)) uploadStatus = uploadEPMFile(MigBaseURL,Username,Password,DataFileName,currBytes,isFirst,isLast,DefaultChunkSize,"") if uploadStatus <> 0: raise "FileUploadError","There was an error uploading data file to the cloud." finally: f.close() LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Local data file uploaded to Cloud successfully - " + DataFileName + "
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') os.remove(DataFileName) except: LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) if os.path.exists(DataFileName): os.remove(DataFileName) raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8"))

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

#Function to Clear Cube in PBCS by passing the CLEAR_CUBE Job Name def HPLClearCube(HPLBaseURL,HPLAppName,Username,Password,ClearJobName): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'applications/' + HPLAppName + '/jobs' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) RequestPayload = JSONObject() RequestPayload.put("jobType","CLEAR_CUBE") RequestPayload.put("jobName",ClearJobName) ClearCubeResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"POST",ServiceHeader,str(RequestPayload)) ClearCubeJobID = ClearCubeResponse.get("jobId") ClearCubeDetails = ClearCubeResponse.get("details") if ClearCubeResponse.get("status") <= 0: return [ClearCubeJobID,ClearCubeDetails] else: raise "HPLClearCube",ClearCubeDetails
#Function to Clear Cube in PBCS by passing the CLEAR_CUBE Job Name def HPLRunRule(HPLBaseURL,HPLAppName,Username,Password,RuleName,RTP): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + 'applications/' + HPLAppName + '/jobs' ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) RequestPayload = JSONObject() RequestPayload.put("jobType","RULES") RequestPayload.put("jobName",RuleName) RequestPayload.put("parameters",RTP) RuleResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"POST",ServiceHeader,str(RequestPayload)) RuleJobID = RuleResponse.get("jobId") RuleDetails = RuleResponse.get("details") if RuleResponse.get("status") <= 0: return [RuleJobID,RuleDetails] else: raise "HPLRuleError",RuleDetails
#Function to retrieve Job Status from PBCS Job Library def getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,JobID): ServiceURL = HPLBaseURL + "applications/%s/jobs/%s" % (HPLAppName,JobID) ServiceHeader = [] ServiceHeader.append(["Content-Type","application/json"]) ServiceHeader.append(["Accept","application/json"]) HPLJobResponse = invokeRESTService(ServiceURL,Username,Password,"GET",ServiceHeader,None) try: HPLJobStatus = HPLJobResponse.get("descriptiveStatus").upper() HPLJobDetails = HPLJobResponse.get("details") except: raise "JobStatus","Error Occured in Fetching Job Status from Job Library" return [HPLJobStatus,HPLJobDetails]
try: #Clear cube before data load. This executes a job of type CLEAR_CUBE on PBCS server. PRE_LOAD_CLEAR_CUBE = bool(<%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_CLEAR_CUBE")%>) CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME = "<%=odiRef.getOption("CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME")%>" if PRE_LOAD_CLEAR_CUBE == True: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Clearing Cube before data load with job name: %s.
"%(CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME)) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') try: ClearJobResponse = HPLClearCube(HPLBaseURL,HPLAppName,Username,Password,CLEAR_CUBE_JOB_NAME) ClearJobID = ClearJobResponse[0] ClearJobDetails = ClearJobResponse[1] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : CLEAR_CUBE job details - %s.
" % (ClearJobDetails)) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : CLEAR_CUBE job for %s-%s initiated with Job ID - %s.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType,ClearJobID)) except: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Initiation of CLEAR_CUBE job for %s-%s failed.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8") + "
") raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8")) ClearStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,ClearJobID)[0] while ClearStatus in ["IN PROGRESS"]: time.sleep(3) ClearStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,ClearJobID)[0] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : CLEAR_CUBE job with Job ID : %s finished with status: %s.
" % (ClearJobID,ClearStatus)) if ClearStatus == "ERROR": raise "JobFailure","CLEAR_CUBE job with Job ID : %s failed." % (ClearJobID) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Finished clearing cube data before data load.
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
')
#Run business rule before data load. This executes a job of type RULES on PBCS server. PRE_LOAD_RUN_RULE = bool(<%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RUN_RULE")%>) PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME = "<%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME")%>" PRE_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS = "<%=odiRef.getOption("PRE_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS")%>".split(",") if PRE_LOAD_RUN_RULE == True: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Running Calculation Rule before data load with rule name: %s.
"%(PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME)) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') try: PreRuleParams = JSONObject() for r in PRE_LOAD_RULE_PARAMS: p = r.split(":") PreRuleParams.put(p[0],p[1]) PreRuleJobResponse = HPLRunRule(HPLBaseURL,HPLAppName,Username,Password,PRE_LOAD_RULE_NAME,PreRuleParams) PreRuleJobID = PreRuleJobResponse[0] PreRuleJobDetails = PreRuleJobResponse[1] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Rule Parameters - %s
" % (str(PreRuleParams))) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Calculation Rule job for %s-%s initiated with Job ID - %s.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType,PreRuleJobID)) except: LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Initiation of Calculation Rule job for %s-%s failed.
" % (HPLAppName,HPLPlanType)) LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : " + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8") + "
") raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8")) PreRuleStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,PreRuleJobID)[0] while PreRuleStatus in ["IN PROGRESS"]: time.sleep(3) PreRuleStatus = getHPLJobStatus(HPLBaseURL,Username,Password,HPLAppName,PreRuleJobID)[0] LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Calculation Rule job with Job ID : %s finished with status - %s.
" % (PreRuleJobID,PreRuleStatus)) if PreRuleStatus == "ERROR": raise "JobFailure","Calculation Rule job with Job ID : %s failed." % (PreRuleJobID) LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.write(str(datetime.datetime.now()) + " : Finished running Calculation Rule before data load.
") LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') except: LFile.write('*********************************************************************************************************************************
') LFile.close() if LogEnabled == False: os.remove(LFile) raise Exception(str(sys.exc_info()[0]).encode("utf-8") + ":" + str(sys.exc_info()[1]).encode("utf-8"))
